local_intent: Approach and precisely align to the cloth corner grasp pose with yaw 90, retrying on failure and verifying arrival.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'grasp_cloth_corner' is already computed and available
End-effector yaw is set to 90 degrees
coherence_with_global: Uses visibility and pose guards, maintains yaw 90 per global plan, performs ApproachAndAlign with retry to handle misalignment, and verifies arrival at target.
